description:
Summary score for the PROMIS Sleep-Related Impairment instrument. Each item ranges from 1 to 5. The total score is derived by summing all 8 items and divided by the number of answered items. Higher score indicates more severe sleep related impairment.[Yu L et al, 2012 (PMID: 22250775)](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC3261577/)

[Search for all PROMIS SRI variables within this dataset](https://sleepdata.org/datasets/bestair/variables?search=promissri)
